name: Monster Truck Demolition Derby- Super Driving 2017
name_original: Monster Truck Demolition Derby- Super Driving 2017
description:
This off road demolition derby game takes you on legendary monster truck adventure. Enjoy extreme hill racing madness with freestyle crazy stunts. Drive more extreme truck demolition here in 4x4 off road derby racing game. Get ready for some real action car demolition derbies. Speedway over the whirlpool styled arena in this banger racing games, perform cockscrew stunts and demolish all in sight with the super monster truck driving skills. Unleash your inner beast and be an xtreme racer on the asphalt road. Build your career with the real car experience in the most realistic off road derby race game. Enjoy the open world of crash racing your crazy monster trucks at top speed with total destruction in latest Demolition derby game of 2017.


FEATURES:
5 Different Monster Trucks.
Realistic off road damage animations
Physics engine auto game with smooth controls.
Test your real driving and drift skills.
Nerve-wracking derby adventure.
Build your career as the Master Trucker in no time
Build original rivalries with al enemy
Upgrade your monster ride
Beat your high score to reach advanced levels.
Tablet support and FULL HD support
FULL HD graphics with high quality
Show off your jumbo truck spin tire skills in one of the unique crashing demolition games. Don’t wait. Grab the latest edition of crash racing games
